level.heading: UNEMPLOYMENT INSURANCE CASES – REQUESTING RECONSIDERATION, A NEW HEARING,R RELIEF FROM A FINAL ORDER (ยง 1-2986)

level.text: Motions for reconsideration, a new hearing, or relief from a final order shall be decided according to the Rules found in Section 2828.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12541, 12593 (December 31, 2010).
